message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study utilizes the World Development Indicators dataset and a complementary panel dataset on firm-level innovation to examine the relationship between innovation and economic development.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "panel dataset on firm-level innovation"], "topic": ["Competitiveness", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We use data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture (LSMS-ISA) and the Global Food Safety Partnership (GFSP) to assess food security and safety in Nigeria.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture", "Global Food Safety Partnership"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This paper analyzes the relationship between air pollution and public health, using data from the China Health and Retirement Longitudinal Study and complementary datasets on regional air quality.", "dataset": ["China Health and Retirement Longitudinal Study", "complementary datasets on regional air quality"], "topic": ["Health", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Our research uses data from the National Accounts, complemented by the Enterprise Survey, to characterize firm heterogeneity as well as its impact on productivity changes in Zambia.", "dataset": ["National Accounts", "Enterprise Survey"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "This study employs a unique dataset on mining activities in Colombia, along with environmental monitoring datasets,  to investigate the impacts of large-scale mining on local water resources.", "dataset": ["unique dataset on mining activities in Colombia", "environmental monitoring datasets"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Water", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze the relationship between infrastructure spending and economic growth, using data from the Infrastructure Quality Index (IQI) and supplementary datasets on infrastructure stocks and flows.", "dataset": ["Infrastructure Quality Index", "supplementary datasets on infrastructure stocks and flows"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This report examines the gender gap in labor market outcomes, using data from the Labor Force Survey and other complementary datasets on maternal health and childcare availability.", "dataset": ["Labor Force Survey", "complementary datasets on maternal health and childcare availability"], "topic": ["Gender", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "We utilize both remote sensing data and ground-based data to assess cropland productivity in Ethiopia, drawing on the Agricultural Sample Survey (AgSS) and complementary datasets on meteorological and climate variables.", "dataset": ["Agricultural Sample Survey", "complementary datasets on meteorological and climate variables"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Climate Change", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Our research employs administrative data on tax collection in Brazil, along with household survey data and supplementary datasets on inequality and shared prosperity, to investigate the effectiveness of recent reforms aimed at reducing income inequality.", "dataset": ["administrative data on tax collection in Brazil", "household survey data", "supplementary datasets on inequality and shared prosperity"], "topic": ["Inequality and Shared Prosperity", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We use panel data from the Global Findex database, supplemented by data on mobile phone ownership and usage, to examine the effects of financial inclusion on poverty reduction and economic growth.", "dataset": ["Global Findex database", "data on mobile phone ownership and usage"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Poverty", "Macroeconomics"]}]
